Dialog 1

Etllugwen nige'?

Are you working now?

E'e, etllugwei. Te'si-gisg'g na ne'w ajiet gaqlugwei, gatu gisgug na'n ajietew.

Yes, I'm working. Every day I finish working at four o'clock, but today it will be five o'clock.

Ni'n mu amuj pa na elugwew gisgug. Nmu'lt's to'q na'n ajiej.

Me, I don't have to work today. I'll see you then when it's five.
